section.name: Building AndroMDA
section.p:
Building AndroMDA from the source is quite easy, just follow these steps:
Make sure you have Maven installed correctly and MAVEN_HOME/bin is in your PATH (so that Windows finds "maven.bat" and *nix finds "maven").
Unpack andromda-src-*.zip into a directory of your choice.
"MAVEN_OPTS=-XX:MaxPermSize=128m -Xmx512m" must be set in your environment variables.
Change to the directory where you unpacked the contents, and then type: maven
That's it! The contents will be installed into both your local maven repository (for maven users) and the target/distributions (for those still using Ant).
The same rules apply if you want to build from CVS version. Just checkout the andromda-all module from AndroMDA CVS, and proceed as before.
